events.name: Hackathon
events.about:
Welcome to our Umbraco Hackathon, it will bring us together within the spirit to create new ideas and collaboratively build apps for the Umbraco CMS.

Preliminary agenda:

9u-10u: Arrival

10u-10u30: Short intro

10u30-12u30: Hackathon

12u30-13u30: Food

13u30-16u30: Hackathon

16u30-17u30: Present hackathon results
